title: Exosomes derived from Danshen decoction-pretreated bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells alleviate myocardial infarction via anti-apoptosis and up-regulation of autophagy
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Qian Yang, Qi-Ming Zhong, Mei-qing Song, Li-guo Tong, Chong-zhi Bai
